00020    AtomType::AtomType()
00021     : mass_(1.0),
00022       name_(),
00023       id_(-1) 
00024    {}

00026    // Destructor
00027    AtomType::~AtomType()
00028    {}

00030    // Set the index.
00031    void AtomType::setId(int id)
00032    {  id_ = id; }
00033 
00034    /* 
00035    * Input a AtomType from an istream, without line breaks.
00036    */
00037    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, AtomType &atomType)
00038    {
00039       in >> atomType.name_;
00040       in >> atomType.mass_;
00041       return in;
00042    }
00043    
00044    /* 
00045    * Output a AtomType to an ostream, without line breaks.
00046    */
00047    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const AtomType &atomType) 
00048    {
00049       out.width(Parameter::Width);
00050       out << atomType.name_;
00051       out.setf(std::ios::scientific);
00052       out.width(Parameter::Width);
00053       out.precision(Parameter::Precision);
00054       out << atomType.mass_;
00055       return out;
00056    }

00060 #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00061 namespace Util
00062 {
00063 
00064    template <>
00065    void send<McMd::AtomType>(MPI::Comm& comm, McMd::AtomType& data, int dest, int tag)
00066    {
00067       std::string name = data.name();
00068       double      mass = data.mass();
00069       send<std::string>(comm, name, dest, tag);
00070       send<double>(comm, mass, dest, tag);
00071    }
00072 
00073    template <>
00074    void recv<McMd::AtomType>(MPI::Comm& comm, McMd::AtomType& data, int source, int tag)
00075    {
00076       std::string name;
00077       double      mass; 
00078       recv<std::string>(comm, name, source, tag);
00079       recv<double>(comm, mass, source, tag);
00080       data.setName(name);
00081       data.setMass(mass);
00082    }
00083 
00084    template <>
00085    void bcast<McMd::AtomType>(MPI::Intracomm& comm, McMd::AtomType& data, int root)
00086    {
00087       std::string name;
00088       double      mass; 
00089       int         rank = comm.Get_rank();
00090       if (rank == root) {
00091          name = data.name();
00092          mass = data.mass();
00093       }
00094       bcast<std::string>(comm, name, root);
00095       bcast<double>(comm, mass, root);
00096       if (rank != root) {
00097          data.setName(name);
00098          data.setMass(mass);
00099       }
00100    }
00101

00106    bool MpiTraits<McMd::AtomType>::hasType = false;
00107 
00108 }
00109 #endif
